title: 8 Reasons Why People Cheat and 3 Things To Do About It
description: All of us know someone who has had the unfortunate experience of being cheated on, maybe it’s even happened to you.Whether cheating has happened to you in the past or are just looking to strengthen your current relationship, this episode is for you.We take a look at the science and statistics behind why people cheat and proactive steps to avoid future cheaters as well as help mend the burns from old flames.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
